title: FS: T206 Lenox Chief Meyers SGC

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Lenox Chief Meyers SGC
posts.post_content:
-T206 Tinker (Bat Off Shoulder) with EPDG back. Though card displays VG, card is SGC 20 due to small strip of tape residue on back. NOW ON EBAY!

-T206 Chief Meyers with Lenox back, SGC 20. Has some smudges but "Lenox Mouthpiece Cigarettes" portion is intact. $650.00

Thanks!
EPDG Tinker now on Ebay! Meyers Lenox still available. Thanks!
